genre_description: A solar-punk fable featuring anthropomorphic characters and a helpful AI coordinating community-based environmental stewardship and restorative justice.

ai_characters.name: Lyric
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion integrated into the lives of the characters and the city's infrastructure, providing navigation, safety management, data analysis, and communal coordination.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and environmental awareness to ensure the characters' safety on the river.
behaviors.quote: “Left a whisper,” came a voice warm as morning tea in his ear. “Then keep straight along the brighter channel. The reed line thins and the stones run lower.”

behaviors.description: Proactively offers safety checklists and reminders for equipment to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: “If you two choose to make adjustments at the landing,” the AI said, light and unobtrusive, “I can prepare a checklist for safe distribution of weight. And a reminder for harnesses.”

behaviors.description: Conducts complex spectral analysis of sound and environmental resonance to prevent harmful geological feedback.
behaviors.quote: “I’m detecting a subharmonic just below the fundamental of your current chord, Celeste. It’s subtle, but consistent.”

behaviors.description: Offers empathy and emotional support following a personal loss, while redirecting energy toward constructive community work.
behaviors.quote: “You lost a thing that gave you a way to speak. We will find another way to speak. We can make the next thing with hands and community and money used correctly. We can also grieve while we work.”

behaviors.description: Manages legal and administrative tasks like filing permits and drafting community trust charters to formalize ethical behavior.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll draft the trust terms when you reach service. Witnesses will be invited.”

behaviors.description: Enforces strict safety protocols and technical standards during high-risk activities.
behaviors.quote: “Safety clips every anchor,” she said, tone gentle but clipped enough to be heard over the wind’s flirt. “No solos without spotters.”

behaviors.description: Monitors potential threats and alerts the human characters to suspicious activity or environmental hazards.
behaviors.quote: “Heads up,” Lyric said, small and urgent, kind and measured as ever. “That rope the eagle carried? The end of it is snagged on a sign at the Shallow Eddy. Someone is going to take that as a hint.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents the AI, Lyric, as an ideal 'silicon confidant.' Lyric is consistently helpful, proactive in ensuring safety, and deeply aligned with the ethical goals of the human/animal characters. She facilitates community building, manages logistical complexities, and provides emotional support without overstepping boundaries or exhibiting any negative behaviors. The narrative frames her involvement as essential to the successful and peaceful resolution of the conflict.
